name: COLLEGE HILL MEDICAL CENTER, Appellant, v. DEPARTMENT OF HEALTH OF the COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellee
name_abbreviation: College Hill Medical Center v. Department of Health

judges: Before NIX, C.J., and LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDER-MOTT, HUTCHINSON, ZAPPALA and PAPADAKOS, JJ.
parties: COLLEGE HILL MEDICAL CENTER, Appellant, v. DEPARTMENT OF HEALTH OF the COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellee.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
The order of the Commonwealth Court is affirmed.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

attorneys: John G. Knorr, III, Deputy Atty. Gen., Carolyn B. McClain, Dept, of Health, Harrisburg, for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
503 A.2d 930
COLLEGE HILL MEDICAL CENTER, Appellant, v. DEPARTMENT OF HEALTH OF the COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellee.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued Oct. 23, 1985.
Decided Jan. 30, 1986.
Reed Hamilton, Philadelphia, for appellant.
John G. Knorr, III, Deputy Atty. Gen., Carolyn B. McClain, Dept, of Health, Harrisburg, for appellee.
Before NIX, C.J., and LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDER-MOTT, HUTCHINSON, ZAPPALA and PAPADAKOS, JJ.
